website_summaries.verdict: Great for recreational use, these goggles have a soft seal for a leak-proof fit and are anti-fog.
pros: Speed Fit Clips make the band easy to adjust and remove quickly without hassle
cons: Fits a limited size range, so children may outgrow them quickly

customer_reviews.title: make your face sting under goggles! Read the reviews
customer_reviews.text: The reviews about these burning the kids (and adults skin around the eyes IS TRUE! And we don’t have sensitive skin. I thought It was the sunscreen I bought but it was only happening with the goggles so I tried them on myself and also went back and read the reviews. It’s SO weird. I’ve been swimming my whole life and have never had goggles leave my face feel like it was burning around my eyes
customer_reviews.author: Book lover

customer_reviews.title: Burning around eyes
customer_reviews.text: These goggles were unbearable for my kids. I bought 3 pairs because they really do fit well and are comfortable. At first, when my daughters told me they hurt around their eyes, I figured it was a sunscreen problem. I then put them on my face and sure enough they burned my skin too. I had my husband try them, they burned around his eyes too. He described it like being pepper sprayed in the face. It's really unfortunate because the fit is really good, but all 3 pairs (2 different colors) I bought had the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: made skin burn/sting
customer_reviews.text: the colors are nice but after one use trying these goggles my daughters skin around her eyes burned where the goggles lay. I washed the googles in water and they still hurt her. I tried them myself and they burned under my eyes too. We tried another pair=same kind and they did the same thing. We are returning both.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Burning Skin Around Eyes
customer_reviews.text: My children all refuse to wear them they say their skin around their eyes burn. Husband and I tried them on the same thing happened to us. What is wrong with them?
customer_reviews.author: Heather Duryea

customer_reviews.title: Seriously
customer_reviews.text: My son is so stubborn for his swimming classes. The one saving grace is that he has these goggles to help keep the water from his eyes or at least the security the water won't get in his eyes. The pre and post rinse/shower is much easier for him with these on. Otherwise it starts to feel like I'm trying to wash a very angry cat with no claws, is slippery, screams like he's the leading role in a horror movie, and has super strength.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Amazing fit for 3.5 year old with room to grow
customer_reviews.text: I would give these goggles 6 stars if I could! My 3.5 year old loves to swim, and she wanted swim goggles for awhile so at first I got her a cheap grocery store brand. She liked them but they were hard to adjust and weren't sealing much water out. So I decided to try these instead. What a huge difference!! They fit her perfectly (and with enough room to grow), she says they are comfortable, they are super cute, and best of all - today we were in the pool for 2 hours and not a single drop of water got in!! I am impressed! My own swim goggles don't even work that well. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Plastic burns and stings skin
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to other parents who posted about the burning / stinging they experienced with these goggles. They were recommended by a friend, so I bought them anyway, but when I took these out of the box I put them on my own face, the plastic really burned the skin around my eyes. I immediately got the purchase refunded, and would advise against purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: now picnic

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, comfortable, easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 and 4 year old children learned to swim this summer and these goggles truly helped them to gain the confidence that they needed to succeed. No more burning eyes or bumping into things. These goggles fit them quite well, with room to grow. We even tried them on our 19 month old and they could adjust down to her size as well. I like how these almost suction cup around the eyes to make a gentle seal. The colors of these are bright and fun, which my kids love. The quality seems to be good. I am hoping that they last us a while, but if not, they’re at least affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Alp

customer_reviews.title: Great price for Speedo
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 pairs (blue and pink) for my 4 and 6 years old. Fits great for this age group. They were $8 ea! Couldn’t be happier with them. Pink/purple one; the lens is not tinted. Blue one is tinted a bit. We went to indoor pool and spent many hours in the water and they held pretty well. I would recommend to purchase swim caps if you are gonna use goggles for a long time such as indoor swiming trips as the rubber could be discomforting on kids hair. (Not the defect of this product, it’s just how goggles are) $8 for swim goggles is a steal! Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Second pair - awesome goggles
customer_reviews.text: Bought for the second time since first pair got lost after 2 or 3 years of 1-2 times weekly use. Fits our 6 year old son (since age 3 or 4) and can still be worn by my 9 yr old son when he can't find his pair. These are not tinted which makes it much easier for the child to see inside and under water. Swim teachers can better see the kid's facial expressions and if the kid pays attention etc. Personally, I think kids look cuter in light colored goggles and when one can look them in the eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2 boys

customer_reviews.title: Actually work to keep out the water
customer_reviews.text: Goggles that actually keep the water out! I bought these for my 4-5 yr old daughter and they fit great. I often see other kids at swim lessons struggling with poorly fitting/poor quality goggles, wasting instructors' time adjusting goggles. Buy these--they fit great, easy to adjust and keep the water out.
customer_reviews.author: BWolf

customer_reviews.title: Great Goggles for Toddler
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my three year old. They work great, suction to his face well to keep the water out and are adjustable. Took him a few times to get use to wearing them, but then again this is the first time he's ever worn goggles. I like that they are tinted too. The split strap in the back is very helpful to keep them on and in place. I would recommend these and could see him being able to use them for several years. He is about to turn three, so if you have a 2 1/2 year old, yes I think they would work just fine for them as well.
customer_reviews.author: M Parrish

customer_reviews.title: Strap too big for 7 year old head
customer_reviews.text: These goggles would have been great if they fit. My seven year old has a small head, but she’s seven, so given that these are meant for small children I assumed they’d fit like most children’s goggles do after adjusted to a small fitting. I had to tie two bits in the rubber strap even on the smallest fitting to get them to fit, and then they worked and the eye was comfortable with no leaks, but the strap where the knots were were just too uncomfortable. I would think these would be perfect if they fit the child’s head, but they did not. So they were as good as garbage for us
customer_reviews.author: ninacoyne

customer_reviews.title: Oh, hey, they're for younger kids.
customer_reviews.text: So I was dumb and ordered these for my 9-year-old after she accidentally left her last ones in the driveway under my car tires. I didn't really read the description that these were intended for kids 4-6. Oops. That being said, she hasn't had trouble wearing them during swim practice. She said she likes them, so I won't be returning them. It would have been nice if the age were in the title, but it was my own dumb-butt that didn't notice that in the description. Otherwise, they're nice goggles.
customer_reviews.author: Dark Lord

customer_reviews.title: Burns Eyes
customer_reviews.text: The rubber on these burned my kids' eyes, as other commenters have described. At first I thought the kids were just adjusting to them, but I tried them on myself and I experienced a burning sensation similar to menthol on the skin around my eye sockets, which lasted for approximately 15 minutes after removing the goggles. Oddly, my kids did not experience the burning during their first use, but rather during the second and subsequent uses. I returned them for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Jacksonville019283

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a great product
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately these are my daughter’s goggles so I can’t attest to comfort and whatnot, but I do notice she doesn’t fuss with this pair as much as her old pair (which was not this style). She also leaves them on her face more than with her old pair, which she was always pushing up to her forehead in between swim lesson tasks. I may even order a backup pair of these. The old ones were adjustable at the nose part and these are not, which I think makes a big difference. They sit better on little faces.
customer_reviews.author: Kim C

customer_reviews.title: Feel the burn
customer_reviews.text: I figured the few reviews for burning irritation were one-offs. Maybe they still are. But, you can count me in among those who got a pair infused with chili peppers. My son, wife, and I all experienced the same irritation. Bleh!
customer_reviews.author: Jun M

customer_reviews.title: Fits kids great!
customer_reviews.text: Makes bath time lots of fun! Keeps the soap out of his eyes and makes him feel like a super hero!
customer_reviews.author: David Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: 4 yr old loves super goggles
customer_reviews.text: These goggles fit my 4 year daughter very well. She does have little marks around her eyes after wearing for a while but she likes to wear it tight and hasn’t complained. We got these after her first day of swim class and she didn’t have goggles. Now she has goggles for class and for some reason has extra confidence in the pool!
customer_reviews.author: Alark

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles!
customer_reviews.text: I used to be a lifeguard back on the day and these goggles were what I wore then. They have only improved the design, comfort and quality. Loved the padded eyes, the adjustable band, the clarity of them under water and the fact that they never leak, if suctioned on face properly. These are perfect for my 4YO son. He loves wearing them to explore the bottom of the pool for treasure. Lol Great fit, comfortable, doesn't leak, good suction to face without leaving marks on face.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Best goggles!
customer_reviews.text: We tried a lot of goggles for my son. We bought from the cheap ones up to the expensive ones. Non of those worked for him. I would say this is the 8th goggles that we bought for him. And this is the only one that he gave a thumbs up. No Fog, no water coming in, easy to adjust. It’s a bit smaller compare to the other ones we got for him but this is the only one that works well for him. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Good goggles for the price
customer_reviews.text: My son likes these goggle, but complained that tint turned everything blue. That's probably my fault, as I didn't even consider that to be an issue when I bought them. But they were a good price, and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: mp

customer_reviews.title: He liked them, they seem to fit well and are ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 5 year old since his swimming lessons required goggle. He liked them, they seem to fit well and are adjustable so hopefully he can get a few years out of them before we have to replace. I like that there is a double band in the back so they stay on his head more securely. Plastic is thick and appear to be good quality.
customer_reviews.author: pirateslovejazz

customer_reviews.title: Adjustment Strap Snapped in a Month
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old son broke the adjustment strap today. Not a very good design in my opinion. We have only had them for a month and they were well taken care of ..... rinsed with fresh water after every use, not left out in the elements.... etc. Rubber strap just snapped in half while he was trying to tighten them. Very disappointing. I ordered another brand and will see how they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Louis D. Bottegal

customer_reviews.title: BEST GOOGLES for Kids!!!
customer_reviews.text: BEST GOOGLES for Kids!!! I got these for my 2.5 year old son and they are amazing! I've been a swimmer my entire life and taught swim lessons and coached swim teams and the hardest thing with little kids and goggles, is the nose area. If the nose strap is too big or too small, it messes everything up. The adjustable ones are a pain and are usually uncomfortable. These googles are amazing and worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Singleton

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and durable
customer_reviews.text: Bought two pairs of these to replace cheap ones we had previously purchased. The double strap in the back definitely helps with comfort and keeping the goggles in place. The straps are quite secure and won’t slip and become loose like some others. We used them for swim lessons for a couple of months and they seem to be holding up well. They fit well on my five and eight year olds.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend! Tried so many other goggles!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve tried so many goggles for my kids and this one finally fits my 2 yr old (almost 3) swimmer. She absolutely hated goggles and would drive us crazy because she’d end up with dry eyes after swimming. She absolutely loves these and once they are on her head she know herself how to properly take them off and on her forehead/eyes. No water leaks in. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: eunice

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for a preschooler!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as back-up goggles for my 4 year old son, and they've fast become his primary pair. They fit his face perfectly and therefore lead to no leaks! He does complain about some fogging, but feel that's a typical goggle problem, regardless of brand/pair, so I'm not taking any stars off for that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My mermaid daughter loves them
customer_reviews.text: These are great for little ones. My 4-year-old takes private swim lessons 4x's a week (it's her jam) and these really hold up better than any other pair we've ever purchased. She never complains of the fit or of them leaking or fogging. I really like that the nose bridge is not adjustable - those are the most problematic. This pair has worked out so well, I ended up ordering more just so we have extras on hand when/if they get lost or need replacing. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ShaeCabby

customer_reviews.title: Much better than other brands
customer_reviews.text: We already went through 3 different swim goggles for my 5 yr old. Most did not last long as they scratch and fog up easily. My daughter has worn it for two weeks now and no sign of scratches and the goggles do not fog up like other ones. We highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Justmom

customer_reviews.title: Holding up great with lots of use
customer_reviews.text: These goggles are perfect for my 7-year-old's swimming lessons. They fit her head just right. The clear plastic does not get steamy under water, and it has not discolored or cracked or anything as the summer has progressed. She's been using them for a couple of months now.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Ziegmont

customer_reviews.title: Great help
customer_reviews.text: My daughter hated putting her face in the pool. We've tried other goggles and they didn't quite fit well enough for her to keep them on during a swim lesson. These were easy to adjust and stay once we found the proper sizing. They stay in place while she's swimming and she's very happy now. All in all worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Nice goggles
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her goggles! She is three and reports that they fit good and are comfortable... They leave marks around her eyes but that does not appear to bother her. They don't leak and are easy to get on.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Keep on swimming
customer_reviews.text: My toddler fell in love with swimming. We got her into a program and they insisted that she have goggles from a very early age. So we bought these hoping that they would work. Her swim school actually started recommending these to other parents as the quality suction and price were so good. So what I recommend them to others absolutely.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: overall works
customer_reviews.text: got these for my three and a half year old daughter since she is in swim classes and she enjoys wearing them. she hasn't complained about them hurting her and wears them through her half hour class. i have noticed that the suction isn't up to where i would expect and from time to time you have to drain the water from the lenses.
customer_reviews.author: OraLee Romano

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 6 year olds swimming lessons. He gets really bothered by water going in his eyes and was giving him a hard time learning how to swim. These did the job well and kept water out!
customer_reviews.author: patricia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for indoor pools
customer_reviews.text: These are the best goggles for small swimmers. They work great on my 3-year-old nephew: he can wear them for over an hour without any leaking or discomfort. I coached young swimmers for years, and Speedo and TYR are pretty much the only brands that make good goggles (both durable and comfortable), especially for kids. If your swimmer will be mostly in an indoor pool, these clear ones are ideal; if they will be mostly in an outdoor pool, they’ll need tinted ones.
customer_reviews.author: Lenora Bryant

customer_reviews.title: waste of money
customer_reviews.text: did not fit well. kept hurting the eyes of the kid. eventually tired of the pain kid did not want to swim. had to throw it out.
customer_reviews.author: SY

customer_reviews.title: We were very disappointed in these goggles
customer_reviews.text: We were very disappointed in these goggles. They broke on only the third wear and the first two wears were only 2 hour visits each to the pool - not hard wear. I was tightening them for my daughter and the plastic on the side just broke and pieces went flying. We own other Speedo goggles which have been fine. This particular model was just sun-par, in our experience.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: will test out this sunday
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my daughter will put them to the test this Sunday. If she doesn't like it, I will come back here and change my review and update the rating....
customer_reviews.author: Wyl Apache

customer_reviews.title: The best we’ve tried so far
customer_reviews.text: As far as any goggles on a 4.5 yr old staying on voluntarily good luck but these do seem to be the best and two swim instructors agreed. Worth spending a couple extra dollars these are excellent quality and will last more than one season. Granted, I have a girl who isn’t rough on her things.
customer_reviews.author: baty

customer_reviews.title: Works Well Enough For Us
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to find goggles for kids. My five-year-old daughter is pretty pleased with these goggles. She likes the color. They do let a bit of water in, but she's informed me that she can just dump it out. She said they're pretty comfortable, but not too comfortable. You'll find a lot of swim goggles that are basically just toys. These are real goggles, but like I said, it's hard to find something that fits your child. These work well enough for us this season.
customer_reviews.author: Garbarino Family

customer_reviews.title: my daughter told me that this swimming goggle was goo, I recommend buying.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter ’s swimming class. The previous swimming goggle leaked. She did n’t like it. I was also worried about whether the goggles would leak. After learning SESSION, my daughter told me that this swimming goggle was good, unlike the previous Leaking, I recommend buying.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Durable and anti-fog
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our 3 year old. He loves them and we haven’t had any issues that others have described. We don’t over tighten them and wear them for too long. He takes several breaks.
customer_reviews.author: EAdragon

customer_reviews.title: Have tried several less expensive ones and these work much better
customer_reviews.text: My 6 Year old grandson uses these a lot. He can get them on/off by himself and they stay pretty leak proof except when he jumps off the side of the pool. They will leak some then. Have tried several less expensive ones and these work much better.
customer_reviews.author: JOYCE

customer_reviews.title: Great for my Preschooler
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my 4 year old son. He is able to put them on by himself. I did have a tough time tightening one side but got it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good toddler goggles
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old wears these without many issues. The band always gets caught and tugs at her hair but really, which goggles don’t do that? They’re worth the purchase and Speedo is the go-to brand for swim gear.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Work great!
customer_reviews.text: My son loved these and they worked perfectly! We did not experience the "burning sensation" that others complained about.
customer_reviews.author: bejoyfulalways

customer_reviews.title: No leaks - Helped her learn to swim!
customer_reviews.text: Having goggles for your child who is learning to swim is so important. It takes away the fear of not being able to see in water. These have great adjustability and suction power. Very quick adjustments makes it easy to share with friends at the pool. The colors were great for my daughter, she loved them. Our son also has a pair. They seem to stay on well even with long hair or pony tails. We would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits 4yr old.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 different goggles for our 4 yr old. These were the only ones that were small enough to fit. And she prefers these.
customer_reviews.author: Double Duking It

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for two of my kids in swim lessons after they were recommended! Great goggles , don’t fog , great suction!
customer_reviews.author: Amber H.

customer_reviews.title: Great for my toddler, no leaks, easy to adjust
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my just 3 year old daughter and she loves them. I can get them nice and tight so no water gets in her eyes, but also lose enough so her eyes do not bug out. These are a good size for toddlers and older kids. They are super cute, very easy to adjust and stay on the head nicley. I always look for the double strap on the back for younger kids, they always seem to stay on the head better.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: My 5 year old loves them.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is taking swim lessons and wanted a pair of googles. She is very happy with this pair, has no problems with suction, they do fog up from time to time but that is expected. They are sturdy, the straps have an extra clasp on the side to keep them from flopping everywhere, they are easy to adjust, Overall we are happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Maria A. Vargas-Fahnestock

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and dry
customer_reviews.text: We bought 3 pairs of these for our 3.5-year-old son. He absolutely hates getting water in his eyes (especially at the beach), but he loves to swim. These are a comfortable fit for him, and they keep the water out of his eyes. We keep a pair in each car, and one by our pool so we’re never without them.
customer_reviews.author: Jerrod Sharp

customer_reviews.title: 6/8 y.o dosnt leak
customer_reviews.text: been threw 3 pairs of other styles. these did not leak on my 6 or 8 old. these are our dailys. will leave raccoon marks when removed. tint underwater is as expected. clear underwater, dont slip off on waterslides. kids can adjust bands themselves on the fly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For toddlers
customer_reviews.text: I ordered kid goggles earlier that were too big for my 2.5yo. These ones are a perfect fit for toddlers. They seemed comfortable enough for him too.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: These are good, but there are better ones out there
customer_reviews.text: I am a retired swim instructor and needed to get goggles for my kids. I have ALWAYS recommended these or TYR goggles for beginner swimmers. My kids just don't love them. They didn't fit well on their faces, but they are small. I ended up getting the ones that tighten in the back. These are fine for light recreational use, and much better than cheap-o goggles, however if your kids have sensitive eyes or have a hard fit, I would try others.
customer_reviews.author: Bo Hines

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Last - Film on Inside of Lens Started Flaking after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these googles for my 5-year-old son to use at swim lessons. He received them as a Christmas gift and started using them in January. It is now the middle of March and he has used them at most 1x/week since January and the film inside the lenses has started the flake off. I would not purchase these goggles again.
customer_reviews.author: M. Oprica

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles!
customer_reviews.text: Great goggles! Super cute color and fit great! My daughter is 4 1/2 years old and they fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Love this goggles
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality,. Purchased them for my daughter's swim class. Arrived super fast
customer_reviews.author: Zaidizzle

customer_reviews.title: They are the perfect size for my little dude
customer_reviews.text: After going through a few sets of goggles already this summer, I was banking on the Speedo name for these. They totally rocked it! These are very well made. The straps are thick so no worries they'll snap as you tighten them. They are the perfect size for my little dude. He'll be able to grow with these for a few years before he'll have to upgrade. I have no doubt they'll last that long barring someone losing them. But at least I'll know which ones to re-order if that happens.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: The work great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 5 year old to use during swim class and they work perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up.
customer_reviews.text: Great design. Easy fit. Dependable and stylish. Exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: AXELL

customer_reviews.title: Good for Toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 3 and 4 year old’s heads. Holds well for the kids’ weekly swim lessons. After a while the googles do tend to get a bit foggy, but could easily be cleared up with water or solution. 3rd time purchasing product.
customer_reviews.author: Kim2theSea

customer_reviews.title: They hold tight and won’t fog up worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter and they work great. She’s 6 years old and doing swimming lessons. With her older ones she would have to stop and readjust or clean the insides from fogging up. With these she can make it the full lesson with no problems. They hold tight and they don’t fog up. She loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Robertson 23

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and pretty
customer_reviews.text: Bottom line: This is the third pair we bought because we are happy with the product. The pros: Comfortable, keep water out of eyes, look good The cons: Fog up unless you spit into them
customer_reviews.author: Ido Weinberg

customer_reviews.title: No more annoying goggle adjustments!
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased other goggles, but they didn't have the split head band so they kept slipping off my daughter's head. The split head band is great because it fits around her ponytail. They fit my 5 year old perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: J Martin

customer_reviews.title: 9yr old approved!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves them! They seem to be working just fine for her swim lessons.
customer_reviews.author: Gillian's Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Fit my 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: Fit my average-sized 3yo boy. He loves them, and they have made him more adventurous in the pool. They don’t seem to leak and he seems comfortable in them. Only wish I had chosen a color that came with clear glass instead of blue tint. He hasn’t complained, but I could see it happening.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for toddler!
customer_reviews.text: We went through quite a few different goggles before we found these and these are the first ones that we found that actually fit my three-year-old’s head perfectly! These are definitely a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: kj11

customer_reviews.title: Good quality usually
customer_reviews.text: Had the exact pair that lasted for a year and a half and just bought another one which leaked after the second use in one week. Will return.
customer_reviews.author: dhead

customer_reviews.title: SANDY Y.
customer_reviews.text: IT'S GOOD FOR KIDS AND ADULTS TOO BECAUSE IT EASY TO ADJUST AND COMFORTABLE. MY TWO DAUGHTERS LOVED IT.
customer_reviews.author: sandy yuan

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for young toddlers
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 3 year old. They fit fine once properly in place, but it was extremely difficult getting on and off his head without pulling his hair or hurting his face in the process. Also left red rings around his eyes after just a few minutes of use. Only used about 4 times, but I won't be using these any more and will look for something that has a clip in back to put on and take off as these are just too much of a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Michael T. Heilman

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: Good price and good quality. Not sure why it is advertised as anti-fog but from what I noticed it does still fog up. Doesn't leak though and it is easier to adjust than older/other types of goggles. Not tinted but it says there's UV protection...
customer_reviews.author: K. Y. Tan

customer_reviews.title: Good sizing, good design
customer_reviews.text: I bought these about halfway through summer swim lessons, and I'm really glad I did. My three- and five-year-olds were doing great in the pool, but too afraid of getting water in their eyes to brave diving or dipping under water. These goggles stick tight without sucking their eyeballs out, and the bands are snug without tangling in their hair. And they come in enough color choices to satisfy the pickiest of toddlers.
customer_reviews.author: Cori

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 4 (almost 5) year old son. He’s been using them once per week for swimming class for the past year with no issues. We adjusted the size for his head the first time he wore them. Just purchased a a pair for my 3 year old for swimming class as well.
customer_reviews.author: M. Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Durable and fun colors
customer_reviews.text: These are great swim goggles for kids. We own 4 pairs. The colors are fun. With so many color choices, the kids were able to pick out their favorite color and it's easy to tell who's are who's. The goggles are durable and hold up to kids rough use, such as dropping them or hitting them on the cement pool deck. They also are scratch free after many uses. My kids have very different sizes of heads and faces and the goggles fit each perfectly. The bands are very durable and designed for a comfortable fit.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Great Goggles
customer_reviews.text: These are a great set of kids goggles. We seem to blow though goggles fast with the amount my kids are swimming and these really seem like they will last. They have only had them 2 weeks but they aren't even scratched yet. They are a great fit for their eyes are aren't coming up every 5mins saying they have water in them. Would totally buy again since lets face it kids trash stuff.
customer_reviews.author: AeKeenan

customer_reviews.title: Junk!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two identical pairs of goggles. Both broke nearly simultaneously the first time my daughters put them on and we tried to adjust the fit. My older daughter was adjusting one pair while I tried to adjust the other, and they both snapped. If only one pair broke it could be considered a fluke flaw. But when both break the same way at the same time, it can only be assumed they’re poorly made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The colors are great, the rubber is comfortable, and the straps seem to stay in place, but these goggles are constantly fogging up on my daughter. She is really struggling with them during swimming lessons. Such a distraction. I feel really bad for my daughter and I will get her a new brand. I expected more from Speedo. I will never buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: No Leak Goggles!
customer_reviews.text: Love these for the fit and comfort! First pair of goggles that hasn’t leaked for my 5 year old son! He couldn’t be happier. He isn’t able to adjust them, but the band doesn’t slip while he takes them on and off.... and on and off.... and on and off! I’ll take the no leak, comfortable fit over easily adjustable ANY day! Previous goggles were easily adjustable for kids, but always leaked.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for preschoolers
customer_reviews.text: These were the only water goggles that worked for our 3-4 year old. They are comfortable and work very well. Buying goggles for this age range was very difficult. We tried so many other goggles and this was the only pair that worked.
customer_reviews.author: Ili

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles
customer_reviews.text: My 4 yr old son wore these all summer & they kept the water out of his eyes & didnt seem to fog up! He wore them the whole time in the pool! Hours!
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 3 and uses these just fine with no issues in her swim lessons.
customer_reviews.author: lovinglife804

customer_reviews.title: Daugter loves them
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves them. I swim as well and always stick with speedo for the goggles. The quality in how they perform and last seems way higher than alternatives I have tried. I could get her to take them off the weekend she got them.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Maybe it's the color, but until these goggles, ...
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it's the color, but until these goggles, my son wouldn't wear anything on his face in the pool. We're at the pool several times a week and he needed to wear something. Teachers tried and failed with several styles and brands. On a whim I got these because he said he wanted pink and purple ones. Maybe it's just a color thing. I don't care; he wears them. There is some leakage occasionally, but he's four so I attribute a lot of user error to most of it.
customer_reviews.author: R. M. Greene

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Great goggles for kids. Spent the weekend at the water park with these and no complaints for a very active swimmer.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Potter

customer_reviews.title: Quality, price and fast shipment
customer_reviews.text: Shipped fast and just as pictured. For soon to be 3yrs old and seems to fit well.love the fact it can be used for few more years. Love speedo products in general and happy to add this one as well. Do recomend it
customer_reviews.author: momlove

customer_reviews.title: Great until it broke it the middle.
customer_reviews.text: My son (8 yrs) used these for a few weeks until they broke in the middle (at the nose bridge). Tried to repair using high quality super glue but no dice. Swim instructor at the YMCA noted that he had seen many of these googles fail at the same spot. Kinda a bummer as they worked great up until that time.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Good for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Fit my three year old well. They adjusted easily and kept the water out (unless she put them on wrong, which happens :) ). No water in the eyes made for happy pool experiences this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Great Goggles
customer_reviews.text: Glad I'm purchased. They worked great for my daughter when she was taking swim lessons this summer. Suction was great, never leaked water into the lense. Daughter said it fit comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie C

customer_reviews.title: Kids goggles
customer_reviews.text: Speedo is normally a good swim brand and we have purchased many pairs of goggles that have lasted months. I am only giving these 3 stars though because the rubber around the eyes on the set we received cracked within 2 days of using.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Z

customer_reviews.title: A bit too small for a 4 year old
customer_reviews.text: My child is not very happy with these goggles. They seem too small for a 4 year old but they do hold the water out of the eyes. Perhaps these are made for ages 2 to 3 as I see it.
customer_reviews.author: Magika13

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for underwater swimming
customer_reviews.text: It fits kids and adults, comfortable, adjustable, good underwater visibility
customer_reviews.author: US-Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these goggles for my 3 year old. She loved them. She asked to wear them in the bath when we weren’t at the pool. I always go with speedo when it comes to goggles and I was not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle W.

customer_reviews.title: My daughters favs!
customer_reviews.text: These are by far my daughters favorite goggles. We've tried others but these always seem to be the best and we continue to go back to them every time. They fit her head and have great suction.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer K

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These work great for my 4 year old. He wears them for hours with no complaints about comfort. I have to help him get them suctioned correctly or they leak, but that's more user error than product. We've used them for months so they seem durable
customer_reviews.author: Candice Janco

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good for the little kid who just learns to swim.
customer_reviews.author: citijoy

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! They fit my 4.5 year old perfectly and were a great price! Purchased for a preschool age swim class, as classes aren't providing goggles due to covid-19. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth the money to buy these. My daughter hasn’t complained about them yet
customer_reviews.author: brooke

product_meta.title: Speedo Unisex-Child Swim Goggles Skoogle Ages 3 - 8
feature_bullets: G.O. FIT System: Middle eye fit offers a comfortable fit for a wide range of faces
The gasket rests within the eye orbital with a less constricting feel
Side release Speed Fit clips for easy headstrap adjustment
Kids Size – fits most children 3-8 years old

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
